subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The teenage substitute Federico Macheda scored in his Manchester United debut to salvage a 3-2 victory against Aston Villa and end United’s monthlong winless streak in the Premier League. Macheda, a 17-year-old Italian, curled the ball past Brad Friedel in injury time to ensure United ended the weekend a point ahead of Liverpool.
